bill_title: prohibit the sale of certain tobacco products from displays that are accessible to the public.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to prohibit the sale of certain tobacco products from displays that are accessible to the public. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 34-46 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: No person may offer for sale cigarettes packaged in units smaller than a carton containing ten packages or single packages of smokeless tobacco in open displays which are accessible to the public without the intervention of a store employee. This section does not apply to any retail store which derives at least ninety percent of the store's revenue from tobacco and tobacco related products. 500 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

bill_versions.bill_version: House Health and Human Services Engrossed
bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to prohibit the sale of certain tobacco products from displays that are accessible to the public. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 34-46 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: No person may offer for sale cigarettes or smokeless tobacco in open displays which are accessible to the public without the intervention of a store employee. This section does not apply to any retail store which derives at least ninety percent of the store's revenue from tobacco and tobacco related products or to any establishment licensed under chapter 35-4 to sell alcoholic beverages for consumption on the premises where sold. BILL HISTORY 1/24/00 First read in House and referred to committee assignment waived. H.J. 197 1/25/00 Referred to Health and Human Services. 2/7/00 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 2/7/00 Health and Human Services Do Pass Amended, Passed, AYES 7, NAYS 4. H.J. 449
